name: Knuwu Travel Pack
description: The Knuwu Travel Pack has arrived. Including 1x Knuwu in a surprise color combination (your fluffy travel companion) 1x Olympus μ[mju:]-1 second-hand 90s analog camera (one of the most appreciated and stylish cameras of the 1990s - to capture your most lovely analog travel impressions) 1x 35mm film in the camera 1x battery in the camera Get yourself and your best friends ready for some world travel adventure action! *** Now go and take your Knuwu all around the world! He's not a toy, he's the one that makes you and the world smile. Spread the love. Send us your photos and show the world how your Knuwu spreads the love. ***  Please be advised: We are proud to offer you the Olympus μ[mju:]-1 second-hand cameras. As the cameras are used, they show individual traces of usage. But you can be sure that your camera will be in a good optical and clean condition. Of course we perform a basic test with every camera to assure its functioning. Please consider that it's still a second-hand device with its own personality and character. All items available in the Quittensticker shop will be individually custom-made for you. Therefore purchases are non-refundable. The production and shipping of a Knuwu takes 7 to 10 days. Purchase multiple items to take advantage of our shipping discount. Thanks a lot. (xx)
